en_source: According to the Taliban's statement, the discussion focused on the manner of delivering health services by implementing organizations under Taliban administration in Afghanistan, the quality of medications and their timely delivery to hospitals and health centers, joint monitoring for evaluating health services, capacity-building of health personnel, and the establishment of health centers.

en_source:
Chinese Companies to Invest in Afghanistan's Energy and Cement Sectors
KABUL (BNA): The Shandong Chendga Group, a conglomerate of Chinese companies, has expressed readiness to invest in various sectors in Afghanistan, including energy and cement production.

چین نینگ شاندونگ شینزو شرکتی گروهی افغانستانده تورلی ساحه لرگه، جمله دن، انرژی و سمنت ایشلب چیقریشگه سرمایه کیریتیشگه تیار.

nllb_uz_to_en_direct: China's joint venture group in Afghanistan's gas energy and cement sector is investing in the capital city of Kabul at a cost of Rs 12 crore. China's Ning Shandong Shenzhou Group of Companies in Afghanistan has invested in gas turbine fields, including gas and cement.

en_source: Mahmoud Ezterabi, a political analyst, stated that the Islamic Emirate has no choice but to engage and coordinate with the world to overcome the current impasses hindering progress in Afghanistan.

en_source: He emphasized the Islamic Emirate's commitment to supporting Afghan refugees, noting that significant measures are being implemented to ensure their voluntary return, resettlement, and improved living conditions in Afghanistan.

en_source:
UN: Since Start of Deportations from Pakistan, 17 Afghan Women Have Given Birth at Border Clinics
The United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) in Afghanistan reports that since the beginning of the second phase of Afghan deportations from Pakistan, 17 women have given birth in health centers and emergency maternity clinics located along the border.

en_source:
Official Statement from Pakistan's Interior Minister: All Undocumented Afghan Refugees to Be Deported in Two Stages
As the deadline approaches for the Pakistani government's mandatory deportation of refugees, especially Afghans, Interior Minister of Pakistan, Sarfraz Bugti, announced that all refugees lacking valid documents will be deported from the country in two stages.

en_source: Abdul Rahim Rashed, the head of foreign relations and media communications at the Supreme Court of the Islamic Emirate, told Salam Watandar: "Last year, more than three murderers were executed, with the first two murderers in Ghazni province and the second one in Jowzjan province, being subject to retribution."
uz_south_source: اسلام امیرلیگی عالی محکمه سی نینگ تشقی مناسبت لر و مطبوعات ایشلری بوییچه باشلیغی عبدالرحیم راشد نینگ بوتوغریده سلام وطندار گه ایتیشیچه: "اۉتگن ییل ده قتل قیلگن اوچ کیشی گه قصاص حکمی عملگه آشیریلدی، غزنی ده ایکّی قاتل و جوزجان ده بیر قاتل گه قصاص حکمی عملگه آشیریلگن."
uz_north_synthetic_ref: Islom Amirligi Oliy sudi tashqi aloqalar va ommaviy axborot vositalari bilan aloqalar bo‘limi boshlig‘i Abdul Rahim Rashed Salam Vatandarga shunday dedi: “O‘tgan yili uchdan ortiq qotil qatl etildi, birinchi ikki qotil G‘azni viloyatida, ikkinchisi esa Jauzjon viloyatida jazoga tortildi”.
nllb_uz_to_uz: Islom Amirligi Oliy sudi bosh prokurori va matbuot ishi Bosh vaziri Abdulla Rahim Rashid Ning Botogirida salom va namoz o'qiydi:"O'tgan yilda uch kishini o'ldirib, bir kishini qasoshlari qo'lga kiritdi, G'aznida bitta kishini qatl qildi va jo'zg'onida bir kishining o'limi bo'ldi".
nllb_uz_to_en_direct: Chief Justice Abdul Rahim Rashid Ning Botogirida Salaam وطندار گهیتیشیچه:"The killing of three killers was carried out by the executive branch, the killing of one murderer in Ghazni and the murder of another in Ghaziabad".
nllb_uz_to_en_pivot: Prosecutor General of the Supreme Court of the Islamic Emirate and the Prime Minister for Press Affairs Abdulla Rahim Rashid recites a greeting and prayer in Botogiri:"Last year, he killed three people, captured one person by his assailants, killed one person in Gaza and one person died in his car".
nllb_uz_to_en_ensemble: Prosecutor General of the Supreme Court of the Islamic Emirate and the Prime Minister for Press Affairs Abdulla Rahim Rashid read greetings and prayers in Botogiri:"Last year, he killed three people, captured one person by his assailants, killed one person in Gaza, and one person died in his car crash".

KABUL (BNA): Dr. Abdul Bari Omar, the Chief Executive Officer of Da Afghanistan Breshna Sherkat (DABS), held a productive meeting with Sulaiman Cilio, the representative of the Turkish company 77, to review the status of electricity production projects in Afghanistan.

en_source:

en_source:
Mahsa Amini Wins European Union Human Rights Award
Mahsa Amini, the young Iranian woman who tragically lost her life last year after being detained by Iran's morality police in Tehran, has posthumously been honored with the prestigious European Union Human Rights Award.

en_source:

KABUL (BNA): Mawlavi Abdul Kabir, Deputy Prime Minister for Political Affairs of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan, visited the Iranian embassy in Kabul to offer condolences on the passing of the President of Iran and his accompanying delegation.

en_source: Since the Islamic Emirate's return to power, both Iran and Russia have continued their economic and diplomatic relations with Afghanistan, entrusting the Afghan embassies in their countries to representatives of the Islamic Emirate.

nllb_uz_to_uz: Iran va Rossiya Islom Amirligi Ning Qutqaruv Gah Erishg'ni Din Keyn, Afg'oniston bilan diplomatik va iqtisodiy munosabatlar davom ettirilishini ta'kidlab o'tdi.

en_source:
OCHA: Climate Crises Amplify Humanitarian Needs in Afghanistan
On World Environment Day, the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs (OCHA) stated that the climate crisis has intensified humanitarian needs in Afghanistan.

en_source:
UNICEF: Four Million Children Deprived of Education Due to Lack of School Facilities and Female Teachers
The United Nations Children's Fund (UNICEF) has announced that four million children in Afghanistan are deprived of education due to the lack of proper school buildings, access to clean drinking water, and a shortage of teachers, particularly female teachers.

en_source:
AFG, PAK Discuss Enhancing Transit, Trade Cooperation
KABUL (BNA): In a meeting held in Kabul, Nooruddin Azizi, the Minister of Industry and Commerce of the Islamic Emirate, engaged with Pakistan's Ambassador, Obaid-ur Rehman Nizamani, to discuss the enhancement of bilateral cooperation in the transit and trade sectors.

en_source: According to the Deutsche Welle report, the spokesperson of the German Foreign Ministry told the German News Agency in Berlin that the process of issuing visas to former local German employees in Afghanistan and people at risk will resume on June 26.

nllb_uz_to_en_pivot: Based on the conclusions of Duscha and Ning, the German Workers' Ministry journal states that the process of issuing visas to ex-domestic Slavs in Berlin, Afghanistan, Germany, and to many workers who are fearful may begin on June 26.

en_source:
Pakistan Extends Residency for 1.4 Million Registered Afghan Refugees
The Pakistani government has officially announced the extension of residency for approximately 1.4 million Afghan refugees, whose legal residency documents had expired, prolonging it until the end of 2023.

en_source:
Afghanistan Freedom Front Claims Responsibility for Killing Four Taliban Fighters in Kapisa Province
The Afghanistan Freedom Front has announced that it successfully killed four Taliban fighters and injured two others during an attack on a Taliban base in Kapisa province.

KABUL (BNA): In the second round of Iran's presidential elections held yesterday, Masoud Pezeshkian was elected as the ninth president of the country, securing 49.8% of the votes.

en_source:
A Diplomatic Meeting Between Afghanistan, Turkey Focuses on Enhanced Cooperation
KABUL (BNA): Mohammad Zubair Wadan, the acting ambassador of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan (IEA) in Turkey, held a significant meeting with Saadeddin Ayildiz, the Deputy for South Asian Affairs at the Turkish Ministry of Foreign Affairs.

کابل، ۳۰ حمل، باختر
افغانستان اسلامی امیرلیگی اېلچیخانه سی نینگ تورکيه ده گی وقتینچه اېلچیسی محمد زبیر ودان تورکيه تشقی ایشلر وزیرلیگی نینگ جَنوبی آسیا دولتلری بۉییچه مسوول اۉرین باسری سعدالدین آییلدیز بیلن اوچره شدی.
uz_north_synthetic_ref:

KABUL (BNA): Afg'oniston Islom Amirligining (IEA) Turkiyadagi elchisi vazifasini bajaruvchi Muhammad Zubair Vadan Turkiya Tashqi ishlar vazirligida Janubiy Osiyo bo'yicha o'rinbosari Saadiddin Ayildiz bilan muhim uchrashuv o'tkazdi.

nllb_uz_to_en_direct: Afghanistan's embassy to Turkey's Beijing Diplomatic Interests Keinghe Yaterishne confirmed in Kabul, 30 September, that the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan will be in Turkey at a time when the Turkish ambassador Mohamed Zayed and the Turkish Foreign Minister Ashler of the League of Nations in Southeast Asia, the foreign ministers responsible for the operation, Basri Sa'ad al-Din Ayldes, have blown up the building.
nllb_uz_to_en_pivot: Embassy of Afghanistan underlined the diplomatic interests of the Turkish Balkans Kyrgyzstan, August 30, Kabul, Baxter visits the embassy of the Islamic Emirate of Afghanistan in Turkey, at which time Ambassador Muhammad Zabir and the Turkish government violated the order of the Head of State for South Asian Affairs Bashri Sa'dlidin Ildiz of the Prime Minister Ashler.

en_source: They affirmed that just as the people of Afghanistan stood alongside the Mujahideen during the occupation, they are now prepared to make any sacrifice for the survival and stability of the Islamic system.

Topics: TOP NEWS, Soceity, NEWS, Environment, Afghanistan, Headline

en_source: According to the National Environmental Protection Agency's report, the meeting addressed topics such as the promotion of renewable energy, implementation of projects and programs under the Clean Development Mechanism, technology transfer, balancing economic growth with environmental protection, presentation of countries' priority programs in the field of green economy, and opportunities for moving toward a green economy.
uz_south_source: ملی اطراف-محیطنی محافظه قیلیش اداره سی خبریگه کۉره ، اوشبو ییغیلیشده قوییده گی مسأله لر بحث قیلیندی: قَیته تیکلنووچی انرژی منبعلرینی ترغیب قیلیش، تازه رواجلنیش میکانیزمی دایره سیده گی لایحه لر و دستورلرنی عملگه آشیریش، تکنالوژی لرنی اوزه تیش، اقتصادی اۉسیش بیلن اطراف-محیطنی محافظه قیلیش، موازنتلشتیریش، مملکتلر نینگ یشیل اقتصاد باره سیده گی اوستوار دستورلری و اوشبو یۉنه لیشده گی امکانیتلر.
uz_north_synthetic_ref: Atrof-muhitni muhofaza qilish milliy agentligi hisobotiga ko‘ra, yig‘ilishda qayta tiklanadigan energiya manbalarini targ‘ib qilish, “Toza rivojlanish mexanizmi” doirasidagi loyiha va dasturlarni amalga oshirish, texnologiyalar transferi, iqtisodiy o‘sish va atrof-muhitni muhofaza qilish muvozanatini ta’minlash, yashil iqtisodiyot sohasidagi mamlakatlarning ustuvor dasturlari taqdimoti, yashil iqtisodiyotga o‘tish imkoniyatlari kabi mavzular muhokama qilindi.
nllb_uz_to_uz: Milliy atrof-muhitni muhofaza qiluvchi Qalish boshqarmasi ma'lumotiga ko'ra, Oshbo yig'ilishida muammolarni muhokama qiladi: energiya manbalarini qo'llab-quvvatlash Qaliş, yangi mexanizmni takomillashtirish to'plamini tuzish, qonunlar va konstitutsiyalarni ishlab chiqish, texnologiyadan foydalanish, iqtisodiy rivojlanish to'g'risidagi ballinni o'rnatish.
nllb_uz_to_en_direct: National Environmental Protection Agency (NPA) will discuss the following topics at the meeting: the Qateh Teklenovochi Energy Supply Incentive Qatesh, the newly-established Mechanism Circular, the proposed bills and constitutions of the Ashish Government, the technologies of the Uzza Tish, the Economic Development Bill on Environmental Conservation, the Balance Sheet, the Constitution of the State of Ning Yixil on the Economy, and the possibilities of the Oshbu State.
nllb_uz_to_en_pivot: According to the National Environmental Protection Agency, the Fortress will discuss the problems at the Ashbo meeting: supporting energy sources, building a set of improvements to the new mechanism, developing laws and constitutions, using technology, establishing a balance sheet on economic development.
nllb_uz_to_en_ensemble: According to the National Environmental Protection Agency, the Fortress will discuss issues at the Ashbo meeting: supporting energy sources, building a package of improvements to the new mechanism, developing laws and constitutions, using technology, establishing a balance sheet on economic development.

en_source:
Young Girl Murdered in Sar-e Pul Province
Officials from the Taliban in Sar-e Pul province have confirmed the tragic murder of a young girl.

۸صبح، سرپل: سرپل ده طالبان امنیتی بلند مرتبه لی رسمیلری بو ولایتده بیر قیز اۉلدیریلگنی باره سیده خبر بېردیلر.
uz_north_synthetic_ref:
Sar-e Pul viloyatida yosh qiz o'ldirildi
Sar-e Pul viloyatidagi Tolibon rasmiylari yosh qizning fojiali o‘ldirilishini tasdiqladi.
nllb_uz_to_uz: Serpolda bir yosh qiz tug'ildi 8a. m, Serpilda Talibanning yuqori darajadagi xavfsizlik rasmiylari bu viloyatda bir qizning tug'ilganligi to'g'risida xabar berishdi.

en_source:
Guterres: 22.9 Million People in Afghanistan Need Urgent Aid in 2025
Antonio Guterres, the United Nations Secretary-General, has stated that in the current year, 22.9 million people in Afghanistan require life-saving assistance due to ongoing food insecurity and malnutrition, population displacement, natural hazards, climate shocks, a strained economy, and limited access to basic services.

KABUL (BNA): Bilal Karimi arrived in Beijing, on November 24, 2023, and was received and welcomed by diplomats of the Embassy of IEA in China and Yue Xiaoyong, the Special Representative of the Ministry of Foreign of Affairs of China for Afghanistan accompanying a delegation.

چین - افغانستان اسلام امیرلیگی نینگ رسمی ایلچیسینی قبول قیلدی
کابل، ۱۰ قوس، باختر
مولوی اسد الله (بلال کریمی) ۲۰۲۳ - ییل ۲۴ - نوامبر کونی چین پایتختی بیجینگه باردی و افغانستان نینگ چینده گی ایلچیخانه سی ایلچیسی، دیپلوماتلر و خادملری بیلن بیرگه چین خلق جمهوریتی نینگ افغانستان بوییچه وکیللری بیلن اوچره شدی.

en_source:
Trailblazing Afghan Olympian Rohullah Nikpa Selected as Coach for New Zealand's Taekwondo Team
Rohullah Nikpa, Afghanistan's inaugural Olympic medalist, has been chosen by the New Zealand Taekwondo Federation to coach the national taekwondo team.

en_source:

en_source:
HRCP: Concerns Raised Regarding Pakistani Government's Ill-Treatment of Afghan Refugees
The Human Rights Commission of Pakistan (HRCP) has expressed deep concern over the mistreatment of Afghan refugees by the Pakistani government in Sindh, Islamabad, Balochistan, and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa, describing it as "alarming."

پاکستان انسان حقوقلری کمیسیونی: حکومت قاچقینلر بیلن قوپال یانده شه دی

uz_north_synthetic_ref:
HRCP: Pokiston hukumatining afg'on qochqinlariga nisbatan qo'pol muomalasidan xavotir bildirilmoqda
Pokiston Inson huquqlari komissiyasi (HRCP) Sind, Islomobod, Balujiston va Xayber-Paxtunxvada Pokiston hukumati tomonidan afg‘on qochqinlariga nisbatan qo‘llanilayotgan yomon munosabatdan chuqur xavotir bildirdi va buni “tashvishli” deb ta’rifladi.

nllb_uz_to_en_direct: Pakistan Human Rights Commission: Government of refugees Belen Gopal Yanda Shahdi 8am, Kabul: Pakistan human rights commission Government of Pakistan Ning Sindh, Islamabad, Balochistan and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Afghan refugees are more likely to be"competed"by the government of Kabul.

en_source:
Richard Bennett Urges Pakistan to Halt the Deportation of Afghan Refugees
Richard Bennett, the UN Special Rapporteur on the situation of human rights in Afghanistan, has once again called on the Pakistani government to cease the expulsion of Afghan migrants and refugees.
uz_south_source:
ریچارد بنت ینه بیر بار پاکستان دن افغانستانلیک مهاجرلر چیقاریلیش لایحه سی توخته تیلیشینی سۉره دی
۸صبح، کابل: بیرلشگن ملتلر تشکیلاتی نینگ افغانستان ده گی انسان حقوقلری وضعیتی بۉییچه مخصوص گزارشگری ریچارد بنت، ینه بیر مرته پاکستان حکومتیدن افغانستانلیک قاچقین و مهاجرلرنی چیقاریشنی توخته تیشنی سوره گن.
